metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27795 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A segmentation fault was discovered in radare2 with adf command. In libr/core/cmd_anal.c, when command "adf" has no or wrong argument, anal_fcn_data (core, input + 1) --> RAnalFunction *fcn = r_anal_get_fcn_in (core->anal, core->offset, -1); returns null pointer for fcn causing segmentation fault later in ensure_fcn_range (fcn).

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
